docs.title: Join Us for an Innovative Open-Source Development Experience
Event Details
docs.text: When: May 12-15, 2025 Where: Vassar College's Heartwood Inn, Poughkeepsie, NY

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: We're excited to announce our first-ever hackathon dedicated to extending the jsPsych ecosystem and advancing open-source scientific software!

docs.title: Event Schedule
docs.text:
• May 12: Participant Arrival
  • May 13: Hackathon Begins (Morning)
  • May 15: Hackathon Concludes (Lunch)

docs.title: What We Offer
docs.text:
• Full Coverage: Lodging, meals, and travel expenses
  • Expert Guidance: Instruction from the jsPsych team
  • Collaborative Learning: Work in small teams to create innovative plugins

docs.title: Who Should Attend
docs.text: Target Participants: - Experienced jsPsych users - Researchers interested in open-source development - Those wanting to contribute to scientific software

docs.title: Learning Objectives
docs.text:
• Develop novel jsPsych plugins and extensions
  • Learn open-source contribution strategies
  • Receive direct feedback from jsPsych developers
  • Collaborate with like-minded researchers

docs.title: Participation Details
docs.text:
• Maximum Participants: 30
  • Future Events: More hackathons planned through Summer 2026
  • Virtual Options: Coming soon!

docs.title: How to Apply
docs.text:
Indicate Your Interest

Interested but have questions? Email us at community@jspsych.org

docs.title: Upcoming Opportunities
docs.text: Stay tuned for additional hackathon announcements, including virtual events planned for later this year!
